content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":18491,"originalJapaneseLine":"立ち尽くしたまま。","translatedEnglishLine":"Standing frozen in place."},{"lineNumber":18492,"originalJapaneseLine":"男は踏み込んで、カチューシャめがけてナイフを……","translatedEnglishLine":"The man stepped forward, aiming a knife at Katyusha..."},{"lineNumber":18493,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ッ、どぉりゃあああああ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hyaaahhhh!\""},{"lineNumber":18494,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph...\""},{"lineNumber":18495,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………ッ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...!\""},{"lineNumber":18496,"originalJapaneseLine":"「俺のものに何をしやがる、ゴミが！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What do you think you're doing to what's mine, scum!\""},{"lineNumber":18497,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐあああぁぁっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Guaaahhh!\""},{"lineNumber":18498,"originalJapaneseLine":"男はランスに斬り倒された。","translatedEnglishLine":"The man was cut down by Lance."},{"lineNumber":18499,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほっ……お、お見事でした、総統……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hah... That was splendid, Supreme Commander..."},{"lineNumber":18500,"originalJapaneseLine":"　DXの会の連絡員と聞いていたのですが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I was told you were a liaison for the DX society...\""},{"lineNumber":18501,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふー。危ない所だったな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Phew. That was a close call."},{"lineNumber":18502,"originalJapaneseLine":"　がはははは、感謝しろ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hahaha, you should be grateful.\""},{"lineNumber":18503,"originalJapaneseLine":"剣を収めて、ランスは振り向くと……","translatedEnglishLine":"Sheathing his sword, Lance turned around and..."},{"lineNumber":18504,"originalJapaneseLine":"「………………ちっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Tch.\""},{"lineNumber":18505,"originalJapaneseLine":"吐き捨てるような表情で、","translatedEnglishLine":"With a scornful look,"},{"lineNumber":18506,"originalJapaneseLine":"カチューシャは舌打ちをした。","translatedEnglishLine":"Katyusha clicked her tongue."},{"lineNumber":18507,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………なんだお前、その顔」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...What's with that face of yours?\""},{"lineNumber":18508,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんでもないわ。…………何か用なの？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Nothing. ...Do you need something?\""},{"lineNumber":18509,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おう、これ、お前んとこへの新しい指示書な。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, here’s the new instructions for your place."},{"lineNumber":18510,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そして…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"And also...\""},{"lineNumber":18511,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ここまで来たんだから当然一発抜いていくぞ！","translatedEnglishLine":"Since I came all this way, of course I'm going to take a shot!"},{"lineNumber":18512,"originalJapaneseLine":"　がははははははは！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Gahahahahahaha!\""},{"lineNumber":18513,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ッ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...!\""},{"lineNumber":18514,"originalJapaneseLine":"事を終えて。","translatedEnglishLine":"After finishing the deed."},{"lineNumber":18515,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あぁ……たぶん、偽装自殺ですね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah... It's probably a staged suicide.\""},{"lineNumber":18516,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだと？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What did you say?\""},{"lineNumber":18517,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わざと殺されたフリを装って、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Pretending to be murdered on purpose,"},{"lineNumber":18518,"originalJapaneseLine":"　牢獄から自由の身になる、と」","translatedEnglishLine":"to become free from prison.\""},{"lineNumber":18519,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しかし、本があるぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"However, there is a book."},{"lineNumber":18520,"originalJapaneseLine":"　デラックスブックだったか」","translatedEnglishLine":"It was a deluxe book, wasn't it?\""},{"lineNumber":18521,"originalJapaneseLine":"「監視の目もない自由の身になれば、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Once free without watchful eyes,"},{"lineNumber":18522,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんでもできますよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"you can do anything."},{"lineNumber":18523,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんなら、DXの会とは別の組織を作るとか」","translatedEnglishLine":"If you want, you could even create a different organization apart from the DX society.\""},{"lineNumber":18524,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ただ……この城の人たちを欺くには、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"However... to deceive the people of this castle,"},{"lineNumber":18525,"originalJapaneseLine":"　かなり迫真の死体を装うか、","translatedEnglishLine":"you'd need to convincingly fake a corpse,"},{"lineNumber":18526,"originalJapaneseLine":"　偽物を用意する必要があるはずなんですけどねー」","translatedEnglishLine":"or prepare a counterfeit body.\""},{"lineNumber":18527,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もしかしたら、本当に一度死ぬつもりだったのかも","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Maybe, he really intended to die once,"},{"lineNumber":18528,"originalJapaneseLine":"　しれませんね……はー、やだやだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I guess... Haa, how unpleasant.\""},{"lineNumber":18529,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………なんつー女だ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...What a woman...\""},{"lineNumber":18530,"originalJapaneseLine":"「っ、もう少しだったのに……くそ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Damn, it was just a little more... crap."},{"lineNumber":18531,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランス……あの男……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance... that man...!\""},{"lineNumber":18532,"originalJapaneseLine":"身の自由を奪われ、アイテムで服従させられてなお、","translatedEnglishLine":"Though deprived of her freedom and made obedient through items,"},{"lineNumber":18533,"originalJapaneseLine":"カチューシャの野心は消えていなかった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Katyusha's ambitions had not vanished."},{"lineNumber":18534,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……と、こんな所ですね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...That's about it...\""},{"lineNumber":18535,"originalJapaneseLine":"「………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":18536,"originalJapaneseLine":"獄中の扉越しに部下から報告を受け、","translatedEnglishLine":"Receiving a report from subordinates through the prison door,"},{"lineNumber":18537,"originalJapaneseLine":"カチューシャは苛立たしげに眉をしかめた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Katyusha frowned irritably."},{"lineNumber":18538,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お分かりでしょうが……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"As you must understand..."},{"lineNumber":18539,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ウチのシノギとしては、かなり制限受けてますね。","translatedEnglishLine":"Our rackets are quite restricted."},{"lineNumber":18540,"originalJapaneseLine":"　本当なら、せっかくの機会なのですが……","translatedEnglishLine":"This was truly a rare opportunity, but...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 立ち尽くしたまま。
男は踏み込んで、カチューシャめがけてナイフを……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The man stepped forward, aiming a knife at Katyusha...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ッ、どぉりゃあああああ！」
「俺のものに何をしやがる、ゴミが！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What do you think you're doing to what's mine, scum!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐあああぁぁっ！」
男はランスに斬り倒された。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The man was cut down by Lance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほっ……お、お見事でした、総統……
DXの会の連絡員と聞いていたのですが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was told you were a liaison for the DX society..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふー。危ない所だったな。
がはははは、感謝しろ」
剣を収めて、ランスは振り向くと……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheathing his sword, Lance turned around and...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 吐き捨てるような表情で、
カチューシャは舌打ちをした。
「…………なんだお前、その顔」
「なんでもないわ。…………何か用なの？」
「おう、これ、お前んとこへの新しい指示書な。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, here’s the new instructions for your place.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ここまで来たんだから当然一発抜いていくぞ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since I came all this way, of course I'm going to take a shot!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がははははははは！」
事を終えて。
「あぁ……たぶん、偽装自殺ですね」
「なんだと？」
「わざと殺されたフリを装って、
牢獄から自由の身になる、と」
「しかし、本があるぞ。
デラックスブックだったか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was a deluxe book, wasn't it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「監視の目もない自由の身になれば、
なんでもできますよ。
なんなら、DXの会とは別の組織を作るとか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you want, you could even create a different organization apart from the DX society."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ただ……この城の人たちを欺くには、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However... to deceive the people of this castle,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かなり迫真の死体を装うか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you'd need to convincingly fake a corpse,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 偽物を用意する必要があるはずなんですけどねー」
「もしかしたら、本当に一度死ぬつもりだったのかも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Maybe, he really intended to die once,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しれませんね……はー、やだやだ」
「っ、もう少しだったのに……くそ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Damn, it was just a little more... crap.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス……あの男……！」
身の自由を奪われ、アイテムで服従させられてなお、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though deprived of her freedom and made obedient through items,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カチューシャの野心は消えていなかった。
「……と、こんな所ですね……」
獄中の扉越しに部下から報告を受け、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Receiving a report from subordinates through the prison door,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カチューシャは苛立たしげに眉をしかめた。
「お分かりでしょうが……
ウチのシノギとしては、かなり制限受けてますね。
本当なら、せっかくの機会なのですが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This was truly a rare opportunity, but..."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

カチューシャは舌打ちをした。

「おう、これ、お前んとこへの新しい指示書な。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, here’s the new instructions for your place.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ここまで来たんだから当然一発抜いていくぞ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since I came all this way, of course I'm going to take a shot!

事を終えて。
「あぁ……たぶん、偽装自殺ですね」

「わざと殺されたフリを装って、
牢獄から自由の身になる、と」

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「監視の目もない自由の身になれば、

なんなら、DXの会とは別の組織を作るとか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you want, you could even create a different organization apart from the DX society."

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However... to deceive the people of this castle,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かなり迫真の死体を装うか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you'd need to convincingly fake a corpse,

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Maybe, he really intended to die once,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しれませんね……はー、やだやだ」
「っ、もう少しだったのに……くそ。
